text: Dibu 3: La gran aventura (English language: Dibu 3: The Great Adventure) is a 2002 Argentine family adventure film incorporating animated figures directed by Raúl Rodríguez Peila. The film is based on a book by Enrique Silberstein and premiered on 18 July 2002 in Buenos Aires. ==Plot== ==Reception== The film earned a total cinema gross of $240,792 and took $19,262 on its first weekend, shown at 32 cinemas across Argentina. The film was nominated for a Silver Condor Award for Best Animated Film in 2003. ==Main cast== *Alejandro Awada .... Professor Doxon *Germán Kraus .... José "Pepe" Medina *Stella Maris Closas ....
